text: this stuff is called hollow hollow and
it might just be the most satisfying
dessert in the world
[Music]
here we have all the ingredients for
hollow hollow which is Tagalog for mix
mix it's a popular Filipino cold dessert
that's not only popular it's the dessert
of the country as Anthony Bourdain
called it it's oddly beautiful
it's made from shaved ice condensed milk
and lots of sweet toppings like jello
corn fresh fruit coconut ube ice creams
and leche flan Filipino sweet custard
it's a snow cone it's an ice cream
sundae it's a sugary fruit cup that is
so addicting you cannot stop eating
hollow hollows roots come from Manila in
the 1920s it was created as a spin-off
of the Japanese dessert MIT's umami
because at the time the Philippines was
under Japanese control today every
province every city and every town in
the Philippines has their own version of
hollow hollow secret sauce especially in
the summertime when it's so hot I know I
tend to exaggerate sometimes but hollow
hollow is truly one of the best desserts
you can try and it's only here in the
Philippines
I'm Drew Pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world let's look at some
mind-blowing mix at 68 million customers
are served daily or 1 percent of the
world's population there's 36 thousand
branches at 118 countries
